name: Malc Doug
message:
Hello Developer…Luckily I had an old phone with your FillLPG app still on it and found you again…I am so happy and just want to tell you I have been admirer of your site since 2003 when I first started using LPG or maybe 2005 when I was in the Czech and you kindly allowed filling station in the EU to be added….in those days they was so few and so far apart it was scary!
Not sure if this is of interest to you but why dont you do FillEV so people with electric cars/vehicles can find places to fill up and keep FillLPG within that site..
The issue people have with all app is running VPN or total CHROME or other restrictions etc….very often nothing to with the developer..
Looking forward to seeing FillLPG on Web3 App Store!!
Also we would happily advertise on your site if that helps you with funds
